title: Your stars today
text:
See what the stars have in store for you today.

WEDNESDAY OCTOBER 9, 2019

ARIES March 21-April 20 ***

Peacemaker Venus encourages you to repair a rickety relationship. Don’t skim the surface though! You’ll have to dig deep! So don’t waste the opportunity to make some positive changes.

TAURUS April 21-May 21 ****

Love planet Venus visits your relationship zone until November 1. So plan something extra romantic with your partner. Singles – look for love with a charming Capricorn or a sexy Scorpio.

GEMINI May 22-June 21 ***

You’ll gain great satisfaction from being focused, as you follow a daily routine – for a change! If you can combine creativity with productive work, then it will lead to long-lasting results.

CANCER June 22-July 23 ****

Culture planet Venus is visiting your entertainment zone until November 1. So it’s the perfect time to enjoy attending a movie premier, book reading, music concert, theatrical event or art exhibition.

LEO July 24-Aug 23 ***

Calling all diplomatic Lions! Peace planet Venus is moving through your domestic zone until November 1. So you may be called on to calm troubled waters or cool fiery family tempers.

VIRGO Aug 24-Sep 23 ***

With Venus in your communication zone, it’s time to improve your financial situation through social media. Perhaps you could boost your cash flow via an online post, sales promotion or joint venture?

LIBRA Sep 24-Oct 23 ***

Your ruling planet Venus shifts into your cash zone – until November 1 - which is lucky for financial matters. You’ll find the more you nurture your nest egg, the more it will blossom and grow.

SCORPIO Oct 24-Nov 22 ****

Vivacious pleasure-planet Venus powers into your sign until November 1. Which increases your romantic side and boosts your social life. So tone down your intensity and have some fun!

SAGITTARIUS Nov 23-Dec 21 ****

Your mantra for the moment is from birthday great, singer-songwriter-musician-activist John Lennon. “A dream you dream along is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.”

CAPRICORN Dec 22-Jan 20 ****

Re-connecting with a friend from the past is favoured. You’ll also taste success through your involvement with a class, group, club or organisation. Creative collaboration is the key.

AQUARIUS Jan 21-Feb 19 ****

With Venus in your career zone – until November 1 – socialising with colleagues will help improve workplace relations. If you’re looking for employment, put the word out amongst your friends.

PISCES Feb 20-March 20 ****

Venus urges you to enjoy doing not much of anything today. So your motto for the moment is from John Lennon, who was born on October 9, 1940. “Time you enjoy wasting, was not wasted.”

YOUR DAY

Venus transits through the sign of Scorpio until November 1.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

Strive to bring more balance into your complicated world. The coming year will be full of some dramatic twists and turns. It certainly won’t be boring!

Copyright Joanne Madeline Moore 2019
description: See what the stars have in store for you today.
